propertyConfig.name: Mesa Falls Apartments
propertyConfig.tagline: Modern Living in the Heart of the Valley
propertyConfig.description: Experience luxury apartment living at Mesa Falls Apartments. Our community offers contemporary floor plans, premium amenities, and exceptional service.

floorPlans.name: Studio
floorPlans.description: Cozy studio perfect for professionals and students.

floorPlans.name: 1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom
floorPlans.description: Spacious one-bedroom with open living area.

floorPlans.name: 2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom
floorPlans.description: Perfect for families or roommates with separate areas.

amenities.name: Resort-Style Pool
amenities.description: Sparkling heated swimming pool with sundeck and cabanas.

amenities.name: State-of-the-Art Gym
amenities.description: Fully equipped fitness center with cardio and weight training.

amenities.name: Covered Parking
amenities.description: Included underground covered parking for all residents.

amenities.name: Community Lounge
amenities.description: Spacious social area perfect for gatherings and events.

amenities.name: Co-Working Spaces
amenities.description: Professional spaces with high-speed internet for remote workers.

amenities.name: Pet-Friendly Community
amenities.description: We welcome furry friends with our pet policy.

amenities.name: In-Unit Washers/Dryers
amenities.description: Convenient laundry facilities in every unit.

amenities.name: 24/7 Security
amenities.description: Professional security team providing round-the-clock monitoring.

galleryImages.title: Modern Living Room
galleryImages.description: Contemporary apartment interior with premium finishes

galleryImages.title: Resort-Style Pool
galleryImages.description: Relax and unwind at our beautiful community pool
